ygData.subject: Inside the Iron Fist (((Alarms go off!)))
ygData.msgSnippet: An alarm is tripped. Sirens blare as AB75 cursed and quickly gets back onto his feet from where he had tripped and fallen. He reactivates his cloaking device

An alarm is tripped. Sirens blare as AB75 cursed and quickly gets back onto
his feet from where he had tripped and fallen. He reactivates his cloaking
device and starts out at a run to his destination down the corridor. He
disappears from visibility in mid stride and keeps on running.
